text: w*bo<AZL>`az `AlA<MUN>h haW/*.a`ar<ZIN> way*e<MUN>W/.Eb W/.Am<AST> w@hin*e<AZL>h hag*o'e<MEH>l `ober<PAS> '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r d*ib*Er=b*o<ZQP>`az way*o<TEB>'mEr s<MER>w*rAh W/.@bAh=p*o<TIP>h p*@loni<MUN>y 'al@moni<ATN>y way*A<TIP>sar way*eW/.e<SIL>b:

way*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> lag*o'e<ZQP>l xEl@qat<PAS> haW/*ׂAdE<ZQP>h '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r l@'Axi<TIP>ynw* lE<SIL>'<HSE>liymE<ATN>lEk@ mA<SIL>k@rA<MUN>h nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ZQP>y haW/*.A<TIP>bAh miW/*ׂ@de<MER>h mwo'A<SIL>b:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<AZL>y 'Ama<GER>r@t*iy 'Eg@lE<DAR>h 'Az@n@kA<MUN> le'mo<RBM>r q@<TLM>neh nE<MER>gEd hay*o<SIL>W/.@biym<ZIN> w@nE<MUN>gEd ziq@ne<MUN>y `am*iy<AST> 'im=t*ig@'al<PAS> g*@'A<ZQP>l w@'im=lo<AZL>' yig@'a<GER>l hag*i<MUN>ydAh l*i<RBM>y w'd` (w@'e<SIL>d@`Ah<PAS>) k*i<MUN>y 'e<MEH>yn zw*lA<SIL>t@kA<PAS> lig@'<ZQP>wol w@'A<SIL>noki<TIP>y 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rE<ATN>ykA way*o<TIP>'mEr 'A<SIL>noki<MER>y 'Eg@'A<SIL>l:

way*o<MUN>'mEr b*o<ZQP>`az b*@ywom=q@n<SIL>wot@kA<MER> haW/*ׂAdE<TIP>h miy*a<MUN>d nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ATN>y w*<TLM>me'et r<MUN>w*t ham*<SIL>wo'<HPA>biy*A<MEH>h 'e<SIL>W/.Et=ham*et<PAS> qnyty (qAni<ZQP>ytA) l@hAqi<MER>ym W/.em=ham*e<TIP>t `al=na<SIL>x<HPA>lAt<SIL>wo:

way*o<MUN>'mEr hag*o'e<RBM>l lo<MEH>' 'w*kal<PAS> lg'wl= (lig@'Al=) li<ZQP>y p*En='aW/.@xi<TIP>yt 'Et=na<SIL>x<HPA>lAti<ATN>y g*@'al=l@kA<MEH> 'at*Ah<PAS> 'Et=g*@'ul*Ati<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y lo<SIL>'='w*ka<TIP>l lig@'o<SIL>l:

w@zo't<TLP> l@pAni<AZL>ym b*@yiW/ׂ@rA'e<GER>l `al=hag*@'ul*A<MEH>h w@`al=hat*@mw*rAh<PAS> l@qay*e<MUN>m k*Al=d*AbA<ZQP>r W/.Ala<MER>p 'i<TEB>yW/. na<SIL>`<HPA>l<TIP>wo w@nAta<MUN>n l@re`e<ATN>hw* w@zo<MER>'t hat*@`w*dA<TIP>h b*@yiW/ׂ@rA'e<SIL>l:
way*o<DAR>'mEr hag*o'e<TEB>l l@bo<TIP>`az q@neh=lA<ATN>k@ way*iW/.@lo<TIP>p na<SIL>`<HPA>l<SIL>wo:

way*o'mEr<TLP> b*o<AZL>`az laz*@qeni<GER>ym w@kAl=hA`A<RBM>m `edi<MEH>ym 'at*Em<PAS> hay*<ZQP>wom k*i<MEH>y qAni<AZL>ytiy<PAS> 'Et=k*Al='<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r lE<SIL>'<HSE>liymE<ZQP>lEk@ w@'e<TEB>t k*Al='<HPA>W/.E<MER>r l@kil@y<TIP>won w*max@l<ATN>won miy*a<TIP>d nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<SIL>y:

w@ga<MUN>m 'Et=r<MUN>w*t ham*o<SIL>'<HPA>biy*Ah<TLP> 'e<AZL>W/.Et max@l<GER>won qAni<DAR>ytiy li<MUN>y l@'iW/*.A<RBM>h l@hAqi<MEH>ym W/.em=ham*et<PAS> `al=na<MUN>x<HPA>lAt<ZQP>wo w@lo<SIL>'=yik*Are<DAR>t W/.em=ham*e<TEB>t me`i<MER>m 'ExA<TIP>yw w*miW/*.a<MUN>`ar m@qwom<ATN>wo `edi<MER>ym 'at*E<TIP>m hay*<SIL>wom:

way*o<AZL>'m@r<GER>w* k*Al=hA`A<DAR>m '<HPA>W/.Er=b*aW/*.a<TEB>`ar w@haz*@qeni<TIP>ym `edi<ATN>ym yit*en<TLP> y@hwA<AZL>h 'E<SIL>t=hA'iW/*.A<GER>h hab*A'A<MUN>h 'El=b*eytE<RBM>kA k*@rAxe<MEH>l | w*k@le'Ah<PAS> '<HPA>W/.E<AZL>r b*An<MEH>w* W/.@t*eyhEm<PAS> 'Et=b*e<MUN>yt yiW/ׂ@rA'e<ZQP>l wa<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂeh=xa<MUN>yil b*@'Ep@rA<ZQP>tAh w*q@rA'=W/.e<TIP>m b*@be<MER>yt lA<SIL>xEm:

wiyhi<MEH>y be<SIL>yt@kA<PAS> k*@be<MUN>yt p*E<ZQP>rEY '<HPA>W/.Er=yA<SIL>l@dA<MER>h tAmA<TIP>r li<SIL>yhw*dA<ATN>h min=haz*E<RBM>ra` '<HPA>W/.E<AZL>r yit*e<MEH>n y@hwAh<PAS> l@kA<ZQP> min=ha<SIL>n*a`<HPA>rA<TIP>h haz*o<SIL>'t:
way*iq*a<AZL>x b*o<MEH>`az 'Et=rw*t<PAS> wat*@hiy=l<MUN>wo l@'iW/*.A<ZQP>h way*Abo<TIP>' 'elE<ATN>yhA way*it*e<AZL>n y@hwA<MER>h lA<TEB>h* he<SIL>rAy<TIP>won wat*e<MER>lEd b*e<SIL>n:

wat*o'ma<MEH>r@nAh han*AW/.iym<PAS> 'E<SIL>l=nA`<HQA>mi<ZQP>y b*Ar<MUN>w*k@ y@hwA<ZQP>h '<HPA><TLM>W/.Er lo<MUN>' hiW/.@b*i<MER>yt lA<TEB>k@ g*o'e<TIP>l hay*<ATN>wom w@yiq*Are<MER>' W/.@m<TIP>wo b*@yiW/ׂ@rA'e<SIL>l:

w@hA<MEH>yAh lAk@<PAS> l@meW/.i<MUN>yb nE<ZQP>pEW/. w*l@kal@k*e<TIP>l 'Et=W/ׂe<SIL>ybAte<ATN>k@ k*i<MUN>y kal*Ate<MEH>k@ '<HPA><SIL>W/.Er='<HPA>heba<AZL>tEk@<PAS> y@lAda<ZQP>t*w* '<HPA>W/.Er=hiy'<PAS> T<MUN>wobAh lA<ZQP>k@ miW/*.ib@`A<TIP>h b*Ani<SIL>ym:
wat*iq*a<AZL>x nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<MEH>y 'Et=hay*E<AZL>lEd<PAS> wat*@W/.ite<MUN>hw* b@xeyqA<ZQP>h* wat*@hiy=l<TIP>wo l@'omE<SIL>nEt:

wat*iq@rE'nAh<TLP> l<AZL>wo haW/*.@ken<MER>wot W/.em<PAS> le'mo<ZQP>r yul*ad=b*e<TIP>n l@nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ATN>y wat*iq@rE<MEH>'nA<SIL>h W/.@mwo<PAS> `wobe<ZQP>d h<MER>w*' '<HPA>bi<SIL>y=yiW/.a<TIP>y '<HPA>bi<MER>y dAwi<SIL>d:

w@W/ׂal@mwon<PAS> hwoli<MUN>yd 'Et=b*o<ZQP>`az w*bo<TIP>`az hwoli<MER>yd 'Et=`wobe<SIL>d:
w@`obed<PAS> hwoli<MUN>yd 'Et=yiW/.A<ZQP>y w@yiW/.a<TIP>y hwoli<MER>yd 'Et=d*Awi<SIL>d:
wat*o<MER>'mEr lA<TIP>h* nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<MUN>y x<HPA>mwotA<ATN>h* b*it*i<ZQM>y h<HPA>lo<DAR>' '<HPA>baq*EW/.=lA<TEB>k@ mAn<TIP>woxa '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r yi<SIL>yTab=lA<SIL>k@:

w@`at*A<RBM>h h<HPA>lo<MER>' bo<AZL>`az<PAS> mo<SIL>da`@t*A<ZQP>nw* '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r hAyi<TIP>yt 'Et=na<SIL>`<HPA>rwotA<ATN>yw hin*eh=h<RBM>w*' zorE<TEB>h 'Et=g*o<MER>rEn haW/*ׂ@`ori<TIP>ym hal*A<SIL>y@lAh:

w@rAxa<MUN>Y@t*@ | wAsa<RBM>k@t*@ w@W/ׂa<DAR>m@t*@ W/mltk (W/ׂim@lota<TEB>yik@) `Ala<TIP>yik@ wyrdty (w@yAra<MUN>d@t*@) hag*o<ATN>rEn 'al=t*iw*A<SIL>d@`i<MUN>y lA'i<ZQP>yW/. `a<MER>d k*al*ot<TIP>wo lE<SIL>'<HSE>ko<MER>l w@liW/.@t*<SIL>wot:

wiyhi<MUN>y b@W/.Ak@b<RBM>wo w@yAda<AZL>`at*@<PAS> 'Et=ham*Aqwom<PAS> '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r yiW/.@k*ab=W/.A<ZQP>m w*bA<TEB>'t w@gil*i<MER>yt mar@g*@lotA<TIP>yw wW/kbty (w@W/.AkA<ATN>b@t*@) w@hw*'<PAS> yag*i<MUN>yd lA<ZQP>k@ 'e<TIP>t '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r t*a<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂi<SIL>yn:
wat*o<TIP>'mEr 'elE<ATN>yhA k*o<TEB>l '<HPA>W/.Er=t*o<SIL>'m@ri<MER>y     ('ela<TIP>y) 'E<SIL>`<HSE>W/ׂE<SIL>h:

way*o<AZL>'kal b*o<MEH>`az way*eW/.@t*@<PAS> way*iyTa<MUN>b lib*<ZQP>wo way*Abo<ZQM>' liW/.@k*a<TIP>b b*iq@Ye<MUN>h hA<SIL>`<HPA>remA<ATN>h wat*Abo<MUN>' bal*A<ZQP>T wat*@ga<MER>l mar@g*@lotA<TIP>yw wat*iW/.@k*A<SIL>b:
wa<SIL>y@hiy<PAS> b*a<SIL>x<HPA>Yi<MUN>y hal*a<ZQP>y@lAh way*E<SIL>x<HSE>ra<MER>d hA'i<TIP>yW/. way*il*Ape<ATN>t w@hin*e<MUN>h 'iW/*.A<ZQP>h W/.okE<TIP>bEt mar@g*@lotA<SIL>yw:
way*o<TIP>'mEr miy='A<ATN>t*@ wat*o<RBM>'mEr 'A<SIL>nokiy<PAS> r<MUN>w*t '<HPA>mAtE<ZQP>kA w*pA<SIL>raW/ׂ@t*A<MEH> k@nApE<AZL>kA<PAS> `al='<HPA>mA<MUN>t@kA<ZQP> k*i<MER>y go'e<TIP>l 'A<SIL>t*Ah:

way*o<RBM>'mEr b*@rw*kA<AZL>h 'a<MEH>t*@ la<SIL>yhwAh<PAS> b*it*i<ZQP>y heyTa<TEB>b@t*@ xas@d*e<MER>k@ hA'a<SIL>x<HPA>r<TIP>won min=hA<SIL>ri'W/.<ATN>won l@bil@t*iy=lE<RBM>kEt 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rey<PAS> hab*a<MUN>xw*ri<ZQP>ym 'im=d*a<TIP>l w@'im=`AW/.i<SIL>yr:

w@`at*Ah<PAS> k*i<MUN>y 'Am@nA<ZQP>m k*i<MER>y 'm (  ) go'e<TIP>l 'Ano<ATN>kiy w@ga<TEB>m ye<MER>W/. g*o'e<TIP>l qAr<MER>wob mim*E<SIL>n*iy:

li<MUN>yniy | hal*a<RBM>y@lAh w@hAyA<MEH>h bab*o<AZL>qEr<PAS> 'im=yig@'Ale<MER>k@ Twob<PAS> yig@'A<ZQP>l w@'im=lo<AZL>' yax@p*o<DAR>Y l@gA<SIL>'<HQA>le<TEB>k@ w*g@'al@t*i<MER>yk@ 'Ano<TIP>kiy xay=y@hwA<ATN>h W/.ik@bi<TIP>y `ad=hab*o<SIL>qEr:

wat*iW/.@k*a<MEH>b mar@g*@lwotAw<PAS> `ad=hab*o<ZQP>qEr wat*A<ZQM>qAm bTrwm (b*@TE<TEB>rEm) yak*i<MER>yr 'i<TIP>yW/. 'Et=re`e<ATN>hw* way*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> 'al=yiw*Ada<ZQP>` k*iy=bA<MER>'Ah hA<SIL>'iW/*.A<TIP>h hag*o<SIL>rEn:

wat*Abwo'<PAS> 'El=x<HPA>mwotA<ZQP>h* wat*o<TIP>'mEr miy='a<MUN>t*@ b*it*i<ATN>y wat*a<AZL>g*Ed=lA<ZQP>h* 'e<TEB>t k*Al='<HPA>W/.E<MER>r `A<SIL>W/ׂAh=lA<TIP>h* hA'i<SIL>yW/.:
wat*o<ZQM>'mEr W/.eW/.=haW/*ׂ@`ori<MER>ym hA'e<TIP>l*Eh nA<MUN>tan li<ATN>y k*i<YET>y 'Ama<MUN>r     ('ela<ZQP>y) 'al=t*Ab<MER>wo'iy reyqA<TIP>m 'El=x<HPA>mwote<SIL>k@:

wat*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> W/.@bi<MUN>y bit*i<ZQP>y `a<YET>d '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r t*e<SIL>d@`i<ZQP>yn 'e<TIP>yk@ yip*o<MUN>l d*AbA<ATN>r k*i<MUN>y lo<MEH>' yiW/.@qoT<PAS> hA'i<ZQP>yW/. k*i<SIL>y='im=k*il*A<MER>h had*AbA<TIP>r hay*<SIL>wom:
w*<SIL>l@nA`<HQA>mi<GAR>y myd` (mwodA<MUN>`) l@'iyW/.A<RBM>h* 'i<YET>yW/. g*ib*<MUN>wor xa<ZQP>yil mim*iW/.@p*a<TIP>xat '<HSE>liymE<ATN>lEk@ w*W/.@m<TIP>wo b*o<SIL>`az:

wat*e<MEH>lEk@ wat*Abwo'<PAS> wat*@laq*e<MUN>T b*aW/*ׂAdE<ZQP>h 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y haq*o<SIL>Y@ri<ATN>ym way*i<MUN>qEr miq@rE<ZQP>hA xEl@qa<MEH>t haW/*ׂAdEh<PAS> l@bo<ZQP>`az '<HPA>W/.E<TIP>r mim*iW/.@p*a<MER>xat '<HSE>liymE<SIL>lEk@:
w@hin*eh=bo<RBM>`az b*A<YET>' mib*e<MUN>yt lE<ZQP>xEm way*o<MER>'mEr laq*<SIL>woY@ri<TIP>ym y@hwA<MUN>h `im*AkE<ATN>m way*o<MER>'m@rw* l<TIP>wo y@bA<SIL>rEk@kA<MER> y@hwA<SIL>h:
way*o<MEH>'mEr b*o<AZL>`az<PAS> l@na<SIL>`<HPA>r<ZQP>wo han*iY*A<TIP>b `al=haq*<SIL>woY@ri<ATN>ym l@mi<TIP>y han*a<SIL>`<HPA>rA<MER>h haz*o<SIL>'t:

way*a<RBM>`an han*a<TEB>`ar han*iY*A<MER>b `al=haq*<SIL>woY@ri<TIP>ym way*o'ma<ATN>r na<SIL>`<HPA>rA<MEH>h m<SIL>wo'<HPA>biy*Ah<PAS> hi<ZQP>y' haW/*.A<MER>bAh `i<SIL>m=nA`<HQA>mi<TIP>y miW/*ׂ@de<MER>y mwo'A<SIL>b:

wat*o<RBM>'mEr '<HPA>laq*<HQA>TAh=n*A'<PAS> w@'A<SIL>sap@t*i<MUN>y bA<SIL>`<HQA>mAri<ZQP>ym 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y haq*<SIL>woY@ri<ATN>ym wat*Ab<MUN>wo' wa<SIL>t*a`<HPA>m<RBM>wod me'A<MEH>z hab*o<AZL>qEr<PAS> w@`ad=`a<ZQP>t*Ah zE<TEB>h W/.ib@t*A<MER>h* hab*a<TIP>yit m@`A<SIL>T:

way*o'mEr<TLP> b*o<AZL>`az 'El=r<GER>w*t h<HPA>l<DAR>wo' W/.Ama<MUN>`at*@ b*it*i<RBM>y 'al=t*e<SIL>l@kiy<PAS> lil@qoT<PAS> b*@W/ׂAdE<MUN>h 'axe<ZQP>r w@ga<TEB>m lo<MER>' ta<SIL>`<HPA>bw*ri<TIP>y miz*E<ATN>h w@ko<MER>h tid@b*Aqi<TIP>yn `im=na<SIL>`<HPA>rotA<SIL>y:

`eyna<GER>yik@ b*aW/*ׂAdE<MEH>h '<HPA>W/.Er=yiq@Yorw*n<PAS> w@hAla<MUN>k@t*@ 'a<SIL>x<HPA>reyhE<ZQP>n h<HPA>l<MER>wo' Yiw*i<TEB>ytiy 'Et=han*@`Ari<TIP>ym l@bil@t*i<MUN>y nAg@`e<ATN>k@ w@YAmi<RBM>t w@hA<SIL>lak@t*@<PAS> 'El=hak*eli<ZQP>ym w@W/.Ati<ZQM>yt me<SIL>'<HPA>W/.E<MER>r yiW/.@'<HPA>b<TIP>w*n han*@`Ari<SIL>ym:

wat*ip*ol<PAS> `al=p*AnE<ZQP>yhA wat*iW/.@t*a<TIP>xw* 'A<ATN>r@YAh wat*o<MUN>'mEr 'elA<RBM>yw mad*w*`a<TLP> mAYA<AZL>'tiy xe<MEH>n b*@`eynE<AZL>ykA<PAS> l@hak*iyre<ZQP>niy w@'A<SIL>noki<TIP>y nAk@riy*A<SIL>h:

way*a<MEH>`an b*o<AZL>`az<PAS> way*o<MUN>'mEr lA<ZQP>h* hug*e<AZL>d hug*a<GER>d li<RBM>y k*o<MEH>l '<HPA>W/.Er=`AW/ׂiyt<PAS> 'Et=x<HPA>mwote<ZQP>k@ 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y m<MUN>wot 'iyW/.e<ATN>k@ wat*a<SIL>`az@bi<GAR>y 'Abi<MUN>yk@ w@'im*e<RBM>k@ w@'E<AZL>rEY<PAS> m<SIL>wolad@t*e<ZQP>k@ wat*e<MUN>l@ki<ZQP>y 'El=`a<ZQM>m '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r lo<SIL>'=yAda<TIP>`at*@ t*@m<MER>wol W/.il@W/.<SIL>wom:
